subSubSection.paragraph:
TYPE
DEPOSITORY: of
L . allii
: United States National Museum, Washington DC, USA ; of
L . bispinosus
: not stated; of
L . martini
: Tainan Branch Office, Bureau of Commodity Inspection and Quarantine, Tainan City, Taiwan .
TYPE
LOCALITY AND HABITAT : of
L . allii
: intercepted at New York, USA , on onion [Plantae: Amaryllidaceae ] bulbs imported from South Africa ; of
L . bispinosus
: Glasgow, Scotland , on imported mahogany [Plantae: Meliaceae ] logs; of
L . martini : She-Cha
, Taiwan , from shallots [Plantae: Amaryllidaceae ]. NOTE :
Christian & Karg ( 2006 : 111 )
considered
L . allii
to be different from
L . bispinosus
. We adopted the interpretation of
Lindquist ( 1964 a: 252 )
,
Tseng ( 1978 : 126 )
and
Farrier & Hennessey ( 1993 : 35 )
, considering them conspecific.
